title: Web Development
description: Modern, responsive web applications built with React, Next.js, and cutting-edge technologies. Optimized for performance, SEO, and user experience.

title: AI & Machine Learning
description: Intelligent solutions powered by artificial intelligence and machine learning. Custom AI models, data analytics, and automation to drive business insights.
